page.title: 04WOODINGDEAN CHILDREN'S CLUBS
page.content:
GIRLS On Friday we have Girl's Brigade, at the church from 6.15 to 8.00.We do Art,Craft and Drill.After Drill we march in our squads.We work for badges.Once a year we do a display and are presented with our badges.We get a drink and a biscuit.We pay 20p a week.Our uniform is a red tie,a white blouse,a navy-blue tunic and blazer and black shoes.
BOYS Every Tuesday we go to Cubs at the Scout Hut.We play games.We go out on the school field for football and rounders.We get into our sixes,we have to stand still for inspection. Sometimes new cubs are invested. We work for badges which we sew on our uniforms. We pay about 25p a week.
